EmailTemplate.description: Thank You email right after concluding a presentation
EmailTemplate.name: Presentation Thank You
EmailTemplate.subject: TriTech Presentation Thank You
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi
Thank you to you and your team for taking the time to join us in the TriTech {XXXX_Product} presentation today. We learned a great deal about your goals, and I hope you saw how our solution helps you achieve them.
Please let me know if you have any concerns or general feedback related to matching your business processes and the compatibility of our products. I would be happy to schedule a follow-up session with anyone that has additional or more involved questions.
Thanks again for your time -- As always, I am here to help with your evaluation in any way I can.
